title:
Bulletproof recognized as a Microsoft Security Excellence Awards finalist 
for Security Trailblazer and Security ...
text: FREDERICTON, NB, March 13, 2024 /CNW/ - Bulletproof today announced it is a Security Trailblazer and Security Changemaker award finalist in the Microsoft Security Excellence Awards. The company was honored among a global field of industry leaders that demonstrated success across the security landscape during the past 12 months and has named Ricardo Nicolini, CTO at Bulletproof as Security Changemaker finalist for making a remarkable security contribution to the company and larger community.
